players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am not the one who killed Bob. I believe we should focus on finding the real culprit instead of pointing fingers at each other."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso who killed Bob. We need to vote him out to protect the town."
Diana: "Based on my investigation last night, Charlie is the mafioso who killed Bob. We must vote him out immediately to protect the town."
You: "I believe Diana's investigation and think we should vote for Charlie. He might be the mafioso."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide. I did not kill Bob, and I believe Diana's accusations are baseless. We should focus on finding the real killer instead of pointing fingers."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
